overview: MUFF is a gross movie about gay guys with questionable morals. BELA, 19, is two months sober from alcohol, cocaine, methamphetamine, and ketamine and a month behind on rent. To cope with his increasingly burdensome recovery, he spends much time meditating and putting on finger puppet shows for his boyfriend, ADAM, 22, a former hustler and current odd-job man who is struggling with the recent death of his father. MUFF shows the world a snippet of how these two survive submergence in their own passion, disgust, and desires.
title: MUFF
